get.description: Gets a list of Serial Console API operations.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

value.description: A list of Serial Console operations

get.summary: Get the disabled status for a subscription
get.description: Gets whether or not Serial Console is disabled for a given subscription

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription ID which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call requiring it.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Default parameter. Leave the value as "default".

schema.title: Serial Console GET Result
schema.description: Returns whether or not Serial Console is disabled.

disabled.description: Whether or not Serial Console is disabled.

post.summary: Disable Serial Console for a subscription
post.description: Disables the Serial Console service for all VMs and VM scale sets in the provided subscription

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription ID which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call requiring it.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Default parameter. Leave the value as "default".

schema.title: Serial Console Disable Result
schema.description: Returns whether or not Serial Console is disabled.

disabled.description: Whether or not Serial Console is disabled.

post.summary: Enable Serial Console for a subscription
post.description: Enables the Serial Console service for all VMs and VM scale sets in the provided subscription

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription ID which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call requiring it.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Default parameter. Leave the value as "default".

schema.title: Serial Console Enable Result
schema.description: Returns whether or not Serial Console is disabled (enabled).

disabled.description: Whether or not Serial Console is disabled.
